episodes.title: Ep 276 - Blinded by Scientology with Andrew Gold
episodes.description: Scientology. Is it a science? A religion? A cult? A non-dairy dessert topping? Probably not that last one, but we’ve got Andrew Gold here to break it down before it breaks us down. And then, a big welcome to our new listeners from… (checks map) …Mongolia! It’s Bonnie and Toni’s Oral Report.  GUEST Andrew Gold www.andrewgoldpodcast.com Andrew's Reel  PREORDER his book: Take It to the Grave: Adventures with secrets, cults and influencers... Out in April 2024   HOUSE BAND Jay Clanin roadrunnerproductions.net   Sponsors  Visit carawayhome.com/PAULA or use code PAULA at checkout for 10% off your next purchase.   Go to PrizePicks.com/nobody and use code nobody for a first deposit match up to $100!
